title: Fouled thanks for replying

replies.body:
Please don't make spam threads, thank you.


Since you made appeal, please wait for a decision on your appeal. Be patient and good luck on your appeal. You were banned for ban evasion, which is when a ban is avoided by using different accounts. Have a nice day!
